alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Foard; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 06 at 3:31AM CDT until April 06 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * TIMING... 10 AM to 10 PM Wednesday. 10 AM to 8 PM Thursday. * WINDS...Northwest 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph today. Northwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph Thursday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent today and Thursday. * MAXIMUM TEMPERATURES...Around 70 degrees today and Thursday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
